cont.entity_a: Tack sharp with brilliant color. Super-sharp even at F1.8. Very sharp from f1.8. Sharp and fast, surpassing Canon and Nikon lenses. Sharp autofocus.
cont.entity_b: Sharp as a tack with a fast f/2.8 aperture. Very sharp and true color lens. Super clear and sharp images without vignetting.

cont.entity_a: Brilliant color. Colors and microcontrast are typical Zeiss. Brighter colors and crisper than other Sony lenses.
Not suitable as a 'walk around' lens. Best used with a tripod.
cont.entity_b: Bulky but sturdy with fantastic glass.

cont.entity_a: Comfortable to handle. Lacks weather sealing.
cont.entity_b: Great build quality. Rugged build quality in the L series.

cont.entity_a: Provides stunning images on various Sony cameras. Top-notch image quality.
cont.entity_b: Magical pictures without post-processing. Superb image quality.

cont.entity_a: Perfect for portrait work and astrophotography. Excellent for portraits, low-light settings, and action shots.
cont.entity_b: Perfect for landscapes and night photography. Excellent lens for real estate photography. Great for wide-angle shots without fisheye effect.

cont.entity_a: Built-in camera stabilization allows handheld use in low light.

cont.entity_b: Issues with packaging and missing instructions or warranty sheet.
